com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

Class AbstractBoundsTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.PaintTool
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.AbstractBoundsTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanvasCommitObserver, SurfaceInteractionObserver, KeyListener, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OvalTool, RectangleTool, RoundRectangleTool, ShapeTool

    public abstract class AbstractBoundsTool
extends PaintTool
    Mouse and keyboard event handler for tools that define a bounding box by clicking and dragging the mouse from the top-left point of the bounds to the bottom-right point. When the shift key is held down the bounding box is constrained to a square whose height and width is equal to the larger of the two dimensions defined by the mouse location.

      • strokeBounds

        protected abstract void strokeBounds(Graphics2D g,
                                     Stroke stroke,
                                     Paint paint,
                                     Rectangle bounds,
                                     boolean isShiftDown)
        Draws the stroke (outline) of a shape described by a rectangular boundary.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context on which to draw
        stroke - The stroke with which to draw
        paint - The paint with which to draw
        bounds - The bounds of the shape to draw
        isShiftDown - True to indicate that the user is holding the shift key; implementers may use this flag to constrain the bounds or otherwise modify the tool behavior.

      • fillBounds

                                   Rectangle bounds,
                                   boolean isShiftDown)

        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context on which to draw
        fill - The paint with which to fill the shape
        bounds - The bounds of the shape to draw
        isShiftDown - True to indicate that the user is holding the shift key; implementers may use this flag to constrain the bounds or otherwise modify the tool behavior.

      • mouseDragged

        public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent e,
                         Point imageLocation)
        Invoked when a mouse button is pressed on a component and then dragged. MOUSE_DRAGGED events will continue to be delivered to the component where the drag originated until the mouse button is released (regardless of whether the mouse position is within the bounds of the component).

        Due to platform-dependent Drag&Drop implementations, MOUSE_DRAGGED events may not be delivered during a native Drag&Drop operation.

        Specified by:
        mouseDragged in interface SurfaceInteractionObserver
        Overrides:
        mouseDragged in class PaintTool
        Parameters:
        e - The mouse event that occurred
        imageLocation - the location (relative to the image) where the event occurred
